title: Hypothesis Testing Interface
description: An interactive pendulum simulation demonstrating the hypothesis testing interface pattern for educational MicroSims. Students make predictions about pendulum behavior, adjust variables (length, angle, mass), run controlled experiments, and compare predictions against actual results to discover physics principles.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: hypothesis testing
scientific method
pendulum physics
educational design patterns
interactive simulation
relation: Part of the Automating Instructional Design intelligent textbook
coverage: Educational technology, physics education, instructional design
audience: Instructional designers, educators, physics students, curriculum developers
technicalRequirements: Modern web browser with JavaScript enabled
